name: shoreline-database
description: This is the migrations repo for shorelines project

scripts.db:production:diff: supabase link --project-ref krzhosadvjdetijqvggz && supabase db push
scripts.db:production:push: supabase link --project-ref krzhosadvjdetijqvggz && supabase db push
scripts.functions:production:download: supabase link --project-ref krzhosadvjdetijqvggz && for fn in create-checkout-page create-hellosign-document daily-invoice-job generate-payments hellosign-webhook impersonate Invoice-status-sync send-email send-plan-request subscription-status-sync test-upload-document upload-document wise-webhook; do supabase functions download $fn; done
scripts.functions:production:deploy: supabase link --project-ref krzhosadvjdetijqvggz && for fn in create-checkout-page create-hellosign-document daily-invoice-job generate-payments hellosign-webhook impersonate Invoice-status-sync send-email send-plan-request subscription-status-sync test-upload-document upload-document wise-webhook; do supabase functions deploy --no-verify-jwt $fn; done
scripts.db:staging:diff: supabase link --project-ref oqbkhzrfguyyxktqxwxl && supabase db push
scripts.db:staging:push: supabase link --project-ref oqbkhzrfguyyxktqxwxl && supabase db push
scripts.functions:staging:download: supabase link --project-ref oqbkhzrfguyyxktqxwxl && for fn in create-checkout-page create-hellosign-document daily-invoice-job generate-payments hellosign-webhook impersonate Invoice-status-sync send-email send-plan-request subscription-status-sync test-upload-document upload-document wise-webhook; do supabase functions download $fn; done
scripts.functions:staging:deploy: supabase link --project-ref oqbkhzrfguyyxktqxwxl && for fn in create-checkout-page create-hellosign-document daily-invoice-job generate-payments hellosign-webhook impersonate Invoice-status-sync send-email send-plan-request subscription-status-sync test-upload-document upload-document wise-webhook; do supabase functions deploy --no-verify-jwt $fn; done
